# The Credera Difference

Our clients consistently tell us that working with Credera feels different.
Our collaborative approach ensures clients feel empowered and supported, all
while generating extraordinary results. Explore the Credera Difference.

# Credera launches global cross-functional AI council

We've founded a global artificial intelligence (AI) council to create unique
insights that help shape the future landscape of AI across the vast breadth of
opportunities and challenges.

Credera Team

  * Service Offering

# Create value with artificial intelligence

Credera’s solution using artificial intelligence combines established tools
and proprietary approaches with expertise and curiosity. By partnering with
Credera, your organization will get an AI strategy and execution you can
control and understand.

Credera Team

# The Savvy CMO Survey Part 4: How to Solve the Digital Skills Gap

Featuring research from 200 CMOs and senior brand interviews, this final
report in our four-part series explores the skill gaps CMOs are seeing across
their teams and introduces our framework to address them.

# Credera launches global cross-functional AI council

Credera Team

READ MORE

Who we are

## Credera is a global, boutique consulting firm focused on strategy,
transformation, AI, data, and technology.

explore our services

AI FOR PERSONALIZATION

## Demonstrate your marketing's value with AI.

The artificial intelligence (AI) revolution has changed the way marketing
departments operate—but how can leaders ensure they’re equipping their teams
with the right AI tools and strategies? No matter where you are on your AI
journey, our experts provide deep insight and helpful materials for the
forward-thinking marketing leader.

LEARN MORE

AI FOR PRODUCTIVITY

## Implement AI to optimize your tech stack potential.

Successfully implementing AI into your technology strategy begins with a
strong foundation and holistic mindset. Our expert-curated resources set tech
leaders up to outpace the competition and leverage AI in a way that drives
efficiency and realizes business value.

LEARN MORE

Case Studies

## Explore a few client case studies.

Leading Pharmaceutical Manufacturer

## Scaling marketing initiatives internationally with a personalized approach.

A leading global pharmaceutical company engaged Credera to assess customer
engagement, create new customer journeys, and enhance performance measurement
for scaling their marketing across a portfolio of international brands.

Customer & Marketing Strategy, Analytics & Insights, MarTech & AdTech
Enablement, Process Automation

Leading Vertically Integrated Eyewear Company

## Increasing recommendation-driven sales with machine learning.

Credera and a leading eyewear company partnered to develop a machine learning
model to pave the way for improving customer experience, product optimization,
customer conversion, and market share growth.

AI Products, Customer & Marketing Strategy, Data Science, Artificial
Intelligence & Machine Learning, Web & Omnichannel Commerce

Global Investment Bank

## Leveraging alternative data at scale through web scraping and AI.

Credera worked with a global investment bank to deliver a strategy and
capability to dynamically identify, load, and use artificial intelligence (AI)
to classify and extract key information from publicly available web sites and
third-party data providers to fuel relationship building and company research
efforts.

Analytics & Insights, Data Science, Artificial Intelligence & Machine
Learning, Structured Innovation

See all case studies

Careers

## Join a team with a mission.

The most effective solutions are created through real collaboration with a
laser focus on excellence. We believe authentic relationships and building
trust with one another and with our clients delivers tangible growth and fuels
lasting business results. Our consulting firm’s mission is to make an
extraordinary impact on our clients, our people, and our communities.

Apply now
